summary: Convert an array to a string, divided by a separator

ports.name: Array
ports.text: The array to convert to a string

ports.name: separator
ports.text: What character to use to separate the values, e.g. `,` (comma) – `[1, 2, 3]` —> `"1,2,3"`

ports.name: string
ports.text: The resulting string representation of the array
